required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Activity Levels, Inflammatory Markers, and Overall Wellness.
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Activity Levels, Inflammatory Markers, and Overall Wellness. A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose for this protocol is to perform a double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled, parallel-arm clinical study in healthy subjects to evaluate the efficacy of a nutraceutical product on physical and mental energy levels and overall wellness.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: A double-blinded, randomized, placebo-controlled, parallel-arm clinical study design will be used.

primary_outcome.description: Pain questionnaire: Scale 0-10, with 0 being pain-free and 10 being the most pain. Change from baseline will be evaluated.

secondary_outcome.description: Digital inclinometry for measuring mobility of neck, back, hips, knees, and shoulders.

arm_group.description: Prickly pear juice, 3 oz daily for 8 weeks.
Pear-flavored juice, 3 oz daily for 8 weeks.
